definition: lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice

sentences.english: Shi Xing pain Chen interests, points out the consequences of the Japanese occupation of Korea will bring.
sentences.chinese: 石星痛陈利害，指出了日军占领朝鲜会带来的恶果。

sentences.english: Motor vehicle fatalities were the most common form of alcohol-related deaths.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒后最常导致的恶果就是交通事故引起的死亡。

sentences.english: Goverments are blind to evils of smoking too.
sentences.chinese: 政府对吸烟的恶果也是视而不见。

sentences.english: Bat loves scaring the others, so they decide to give him a taste of his own medicine.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠喜欢吓唬别人，所以大家想让他自食恶果一下。

sentences.english: This danger independences is as a result of "country" cause.
sentences.chinese: 这类伤害恶果是由于有了“国家”酿成的。

sentences.english: A person's good consequences bad result, you want from the food.
sentences.chinese: 一个人的善果恶果，你都要自食。

sentences.english: This is the effect of unbalanced prana shakti.
sentences.chinese: 这就是不平衡的生命力所引发的恶果。

sentences.english: It shows what happens when you nationalize banks and credit.
sentences.chinese: 它会告诉你当你国有化银行和信用以后的恶果。

sentences.english: There was an outcry against the concomitants of industrial growth.
sentences.chinese: 人们强烈抗议工业迅猛增长所带来的一系列恶果。

sentences.english: Harmonizing taxes would have similarly deleterious consequences.
sentences.chinese: 税收政策的一体化也会产生相似的恶果。

sentences.english: America suffers from serious rigidities of its own.
sentences.chinese: 美国承受着自身体制僵化的恶果。

sentences.english: How fast do these Google search results come at you anyway?
sentences.chinese: 那么，的谷歌搜求引擎恶果究竟有多快呢？

sentences.english: However, it is possible to cause harmful consequence of disordering the function of stomach and intestine and malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 但是这也有引起胃肠功能失调和营养不良恶果的可能。

sentences.english: The weak must submit to the strong or face the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 弱者应听从强者，否则将自食恶果。

sentences.english: You are now reaping the consequences .
None who performs good deeds, comes to an evil end.
sentences.chinese: 没有谁行善反得恶果的。

definition: root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
to eat one's own fruit (idiom); fig. suffering the consequences of one's own action/to reap what one has sown
lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice
see 自食惡果|自食恶果[zi4 shi2 e4 guo3]
